name: part_001
file: tmp_【Ayunda Risu 3D Birthday】The Rise of the NUT Warrior 【#TheNutWarrior】 [VYSAfYJ6FhI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu performs a cover of 'Gurenge' by LiSA in a burning village.
The fire is gone, leaving a foggy ruin. Nerissa Ravencroft walks through the village.
Nerissa and Risu meet. Nerissa mourns her village, and Risu promises to stop the monster.

subtitles.original: 泥だらけの走馬灯に酔う
subtitles.english: Drunk on a mud-covered revolving lantern

subtitles.original: こわばる心 震える手は
subtitles.english: My stiffened heart, my trembling hands

subtitles.original: 掴みたいものがある
subtitles.english: There is something I want to grasp

subtitles.original: それだけさ
subtitles.english: That's all

subtitles.original: 夜の匂いに
subtitles.english: In the smell of night

subtitles.original: (I'll spend all thirty nights) 空に睨んでも
subtitles.english: (I'll spend all thirty nights) Even if I glare at the sky

subtitles.original: (Staring into the sky) 変わっていけるのは自分自身だけ
subtitles.english: (Staring into the sky) The only thing that can change is myself

subtitles.original: それだけさ
subtitles.english: That's all

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: I've learned the reason to become strong, take me and go forward

subtitles.original: どうしたって 消せない夢も 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: No matter what, a dream I can't erase, a present I can't stop

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can become strong for someone else

subtitles.original: ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: Thank you, sadness

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: Beaten down by the world, I've learned the meaning of defeat

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Guren flower, bloom in glory

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Light up my fate

subtitles.original: イナビカリの雑音が耳を刺す
subtitles.english: The noise of lightning stabs my ears

subtitles.original: 戸惑う心 優しいだけじゃ守れないものがある
subtitles.english: A confused heart, there are things that can't be protected just by being kind

subtitles.original: わかってるけど
subtitles.english: I know, but...

subtitles.original: 水面下で絡まる善悪 透けて見える偽善に天罰
subtitles.english: Good and evil intertwined beneath the surface, divine punishment for the transparent hypocrisy

subtitles.original: (Tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, tell me... I don't need you!)
subtitles.english: (Tell me why, tell me why, tell me why, tell me... I don't need you!)

subtitles.original: 逸材の華より 挑み続け咲いた一輪が美しい
subtitles.english: More beautiful than a flower of rare talent, is the single flower that kept on challenging to bloom

subtitles.original: 乱暴に敷き詰められた 棘だらけの道も
subtitles.english: Even a road roughly covered in thorns

subtitles.original: 本気の僕だけに現れるから
subtitles.english: Will appear only to the serious me

subtitles.original: 乗り越えてみせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can overcome it

subtitles.original: 簡単に片付けられた 守れなかった夢も
subtitles.english: A dream easily pushed aside, a dream I couldn't protect

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の心臓に根を生やし
subtitles.english: Rooted in a crimson heart

subtitles.original: この血に宿って
subtitles.english: Dwelling in this blood

subtitles.original: ヒトシレズハカナイ チリユクケツマツ
subtitles.english: An unknown, fleeting, fading end

subtitles.original: ムジョウニヤブレタ ヒメイノカゼフク
subtitles.english: A heartless, torn wind of screams blows

subtitles.original: 誰かの笑う影 誰かの泣き声
subtitles.english: Someone's laughing shadow, someone's crying voice

subtitles.original: 誰もが幸せを願ってる
subtitles.english: Everyone is wishing for happiness

subtitles.original: どうしたって 消せない夢も 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: No matter what, a dream I can't erase, a present I can't stop

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can become strong for someone else

subtitles.original: ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: Thank you, sadness

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: Beaten down by the world, I've learned the meaning of defeat

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Guren flower, bloom in glory

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Light up my fate

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Light up my fate

subtitles.original: Oh no!
subtitles.english: Oh no!

subtitles.original: Everything is burned down.
subtitles.english: Everything is burned down.

subtitles.original: My house and the entire village is destroyed.
subtitles.english: My house and the entire village is destroyed.

subtitles.original: What is going on?
subtitles.english: What is going on?

subtitles.original: Are you alright?
subtitles.english: Are you alright?

subtitles.original: A giant monster...
subtitles.english: A giant monster...

subtitles.original: ...burned down my entire village with its fire breath.
subtitles.english: ...burned down my entire village with its fire breath.

subtitles.original: That is bad.
subtitles.english: That is bad.

subtitles.original: Do you know where that monster is heading?
subtitles.english: Do you know where that monster is heading?

subtitles.original: I think it's headed to the next village.
subtitles.english: I think it's headed to the next village.

subtitles.original: Don't worry.
subtitles.english: Don't worry.

subtitles.original: I shall take care of it for you so it won't destroy the other village too.
subtitles.english: I shall take care of it for you so it won't destroy the other village too.

subtitles.original: In order to do that, I need to collect power by singing and music.
subtitles.english: In order to do that, I need to collect power by singing and music.

subtitles.original: So please, lend me your power, oh dear villager.
subtitles.english: So please, lend me your power, oh dear villager.

subtitles.original: Oh, I will!
subtitles.english: Oh, I will!
